ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] HTML5 and RESTful HTTP in browsers
ygData.msgSnippet: I don’t follow this conversation at all. If you serve different representations to a client via content negotiation you shouldn’t care which one a client

I don=E2=80=99t follow this conversation at all.

If you serve different re=
presentations to a client via content
negotiation you shouldn=E2=80=99t car=
e which one a client receives. If you do
care, then you have multiple resou=
rces, and should use multiple URIs.
This doesn=E2=80=99t seem very complica=
ted.

Am I missing something?
